snippet: Shares also came under some pressure after the World Bank cut growth forecasts for the East Asia and Pacific region.
abstract: Stocks slip in light Columbus Day trading, pulling back from their highest levels in close to five years as investors brace for an expected weak earnings season.
lead_paragraph: Shares also came under some pressure after the World Bank cut growth forecasts for the East Asia and Pacific region.

headline.seo: Markets Fall on Expectation of Weak Earnings Reports
